subject: Horse Racing
Animal Abuse, Rights and Welfare
organizations: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
lead_paragraph: After an undercover investigation, PETA filed complaints Tuesday with federal and state agencies, accusing Steve Asmussen and Scott Blasi of mistreating their horses.
snippet: After an undercover investigation, PETA filed complaints Tuesday with federal and state agencies, accusing Steve Asmussen and Scott Blasi of mistreating their horses.
